resources.string: Ordenary Moscow citizen Boris: he really loves beer, he gets twice amount of health by drinking one!
Popular professor Peter: a pretty correct man, many people likes him, so he always start with SIX cards!!
Master destroyer: he loves the destruction, and the big booms! His dinamytes causes twice damage!
Wild beast Harambe: by a big misunderstanding it gotten many bangs, so it had to harden! It has 6 health point!
Engineer student Harold: he loves learning! He draws two cards at the start of his turn!
Mysteriously smiling Ricardo: He has seriously bombastic body, that counts as a weapon! His dinamytes causes twice damage!
Funny drunk priest Tibor: long time ago he was very funny, now he just drinks. He starts with 3 beer in his hand!
Regular citizen: random guy Normie. Doesnt have any special abilities
